description:
All you need to know about Ubuntu 24.04 — the release date, what’s new, where to download it, FAQs, and more.

The post Ubuntu 24.04: Release Date, New Features to Expect & More appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Ubuntu 24.04: Release Date, New Features to Expect & More

description:
Redka is a work-in-progress server that blends Redis and SQLite. It supports data beyond RAM, ensuring robust performance and flexibility.

The post Redka Debuts as a Scalable Alternative to Redis with SQLite Integration appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Redka Debuts as a Scalable Alternative to Redis with SQLite Integration

description:
Today, Mozilla published the final build of Firefox 125 as the latest stable release for their popular open-source and cross-platform web browser that introduces new features and many improvements.

The post Mozilla Firefox 125 Is Now Available for Download, This Is What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Mozilla Firefox 125 Is Now Available for Download, This Is What’s New

description:
Lakka 5.0 is a major update with plenty of useful feature additions and core improvements.

The post Lakka 5.0 Linux Distro Release: Upgrade Your Retro Gaming Experience With This! appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Lakka 5.0 Linux Distro Release: Upgrade Your Retro Gaming Experience With This!

description:
The new Sparky CLI Installer now supports autopartitioning to speed up setups. Autologin enabled, and GRUB installation included.

The post Sparky CLI Installer Introduces Autopartitioning in Latest Update appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Sparky CLI Installer Introduces Autopartitioning in Latest Update
